Content.Text:
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? It looks like they want something  
from you. Would you mind taking a look?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, there they are. They're faster than 
I thought.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm. They look as if they wanted to
say something. What could it be?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. What's wrong? Do you understand
what the turtles want to say?

Seems like they wanted to show me this.
Charles is probably worried about me,
so I'd better head back.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! Amazing! The turtles started 
moving all of a sudden. So? What 
actually happened?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, my! They took you to their islet!
How endearing!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nevertheless, such affable creatures.
Maybe they could take you there again
some other time if you wanted.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ooh, it worked. Seems like they would
take you there again, indeed. You 
could try chatting with them next time.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hahaha! Today was such a treat! I have
to tell Hina about it later. She'll
be so jealous.
<PAGE>
Shall we head back now?
